actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to amend section 101 of the Housing and Urban Development Act of 1965 to provide increased rent supplement payments in the case of tenants with larger families.

summary.text: Revises the formula for computing the rent supplement payments under the Housing and Urban Development Act by deducting from the tenant's income $200 for each minor and adult member of the family having no income. (Amends 12 U.S.C. 170s (d))

titles.title: A bill to amend section 101 of the Housing and Urban Development Act of 1965 to provide increased rent supplement payments in the case of tenants with larger families.
